#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define sz 100000
#define pb(a) push_back(a)
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define fread freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fwrite freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define inf (1<<29)
#define mem(abc,z) memset(abc,z,sizeof(abc))
#define PI acos(-1)
#define quick ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0)

int main(){
   int t,n,st1,st2;
   string s,tt,tmp;
   bool flg;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--){
     cin>>s>>tt;
     flg=true;
     st1=st2=0;
     for(;st1<s.size() && st2<tt.size();){
        while(st1<s.size() && st2<tt.size() && s[st1]==tt[st2]){
            st1++;
            st2++;
        }
        if(flg && st1<s.size() && st2<tt.size() && s[st1]!=tt[st2]){
            st1++;
            flg=false;
            continue;
        }
        if(!flg){
            while(st1<s.size() && st2<tt.size() && s[st1]==tt[st2]){
                st1++;
                st2++;
            }
            if(st1==s.size() && st2==tt.size()){
                flg=true;
                break;
            }
            else break;
        }
     }
     if(flg && tt.size()==s.size()-1) puts("1");
     else puts("0");
   }
   return 0;
}
